thread.title: Our favourite place in NYC !
thread.title_full: Our favourite place in NYC ! - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: marpalvan
title: Our favourite place in NYC !
text: My husband and I always stay at the Lexington when in NYC ! :) it's our favourite place ! The jazzy vibe is awesome, the rooms are beautiful, the Christmas decorations are perfect! The location is great and the staff is really helpful. We're coming back soon ! It's great having a hotel that feels familiar and inviting in a city that tends to get crazy !
